info.title: Document Merge
info.description: SharePoint Document and Mail Merge is the simple, fast and clean way to merge SharePoint list data into predefined Word, Excel and PowerPoint document templates with NO CODE!

parameters.name: LinkToItem
parameters.description: Select the Link to item option from Dynamic content - see manual for help - www.documentmerge.com

parameters.name: PreConfigTemplate
parameters.description: Available when the Document and Mail Merge Add-In is installed - www.documentmerge.com

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description: Set the path to the source document Template e.g. "LibraryName\TemaplateName.docx"

parameters.name: Destination
parameters.description: The Library name to store generated document

parameters.name: SaveAsPDF
parameters.description: Set to save an accompany PDF file

parameters.name: SaveAsPDFOnly
parameters.description: Set to save only a PDF file no accompanying document

parameters.name: SaveAsPDFA
parameters.description: Set to save PDF file as PDF\A format

parameters.name: DisplayImage
parameters.description: Will display Image instead of hyperlink of image

parameters.name: OutputFileName
parameters.description: The name to save the file - can include list internal column names - see manual www.documentmerge.com

parameters.name: OverWrite
parameters.description: Overwrite the document if same name

parameters.name: SendMail
parameters.description: Available when the Document and Mail Merge Add-In is installed

parameters.name: MailTemplate
parameters.description: Specify if SendMail Option selected e.g. "TemplateTitleName"
